title: Coconut and citrus tart with cherry, pineapple, raspberry and coconut fruit salad
description: Matt’s super-simple topical tart is a ray of sunshine.
ingredients: 25g/1oz fresh coconut, finely grated, to decorate
small fresh mint leaves, to decorate
2 limes, juice and finely grated zest
2 unwaxed lemons, juice and finely grated zest
